All Classes

Class
Description
Board
Class Board describes a player's personal Board.
BoardController
Class BoardController represents the controller of a player's board
BoardControllerTest
 
BoardsController
Class BoardsController is the GUI controller of every player's board.
BoardTest
 
Card
 
CardDev
Enumeration class used to list Development Cards
CardDevTest
 
CardLeader
Class enumeration for Leader Cards
CardLeaderTest
 
Checker
 
CheckerTest
 
CLI
Class CLI creates the Command Line Interface which is on of the two ways to play the game
Client
Class Client handles Client side and receives messages from server
ClientApp
Class ClientApp instantiates and starts the client
Colours
 
ColoursCards
 
ColoursCardsTest
 
ColoursTest
 
ConsoleColors
Class ConsoleColors is the class that contains all the possible colors which might have a use in the Command Line Interface
Constants
 
Controller
Class Controller is a class that contains every single game's controller.
ControllerTest
 
DrawerCLI
 
FaithTrack
Class FaithTrack is a representation of the Faith Track on a player's board.
FaithTrackTest
 
Game
Class Game provides a Model for the Game.
GameController
Class GameController is the controller that handles one game.
GameControllerTest
 
GameTest
 
GUI
Method GUI is used to create the Graphical User Interface of the game.
GUIController
 
InitialLeader
class InitialLeader is the class responsible to show the players the initial Leader Cards that can be chosen in the GUI.
Json
Class Json handles the serialization of the object when needed
JsonTest
 
Library
Class Library is where a player can store his Development Cards.
LibraryTest
 
Local
Class Local handles local's single player game
LocalBoardController
 
LocalGame
Class LocalGame is the model for the local single player game without establishing any connections.
LocalGameController
Class LocalGameController is the controller class for the local single player game.
Lorenzo
Class Lorenzo is the model for Lorenzo who is a player's opponent whenever he decides to play local single player.
MainMenuController
MainMenuController is the controller class for the scene Main Menu in the Graphical User Interface.
Market
Class Market is used to represent and describe the Market system in the game.
MarketTest
 
MastersOfRenaissanceCLI
Class MasterOfRenaissanceCLI starts Command Line Interface in case the player decides to play with it.
MastersOfRenaissanceGUI
This class handles the main menu when it's chosen to play with the Graphical User Interface and allows the User to choose between Single Player, Multi Player or exiting the game.
Mod
Class Mod is a class that contains every single game's Model.
ModelBoard
Class ModelBoard is the class describing all the other players' boards.
ModelView
Class ModelView is the client mirror of the Model on the server side.
ModTest
 
Pick
Class Pick is the one which associates number of resources to its type
PickTest
 
RemoteView
Class RemoteView is used as a Listener for the model on the Server Side and makes messages ready for the Client.
Requirements
Interface Requirements handles Card Leader's requirements
Requirements.RequirementsCard
Class RequirementsCard handles Card Leader's requirements (Development Cards)
Requirements.RequirementsResources
Class RequirementsResources handles Cards' requirements (Resources)
RequirementsTest
 
ResizeHandler
Class ResizeHandler is a class that is used by the Graphical User Interface.
Server
After the server has been created, this class Server is used to handle multiple Socket Connections from different clients.
ServerApp
Class ServerApp is used to create a Server, asking for the Port from which the Server will listen on.
SetupController
 
SimpleTestCaseJsonPOJO
 
SocketServerToClient
Class SocketServerToClient is the class used to create a connection between the Server and the clients.
SoloAction
Class enumeration SoloAction handles all of Lorenzo's possible moves whenever the game is in single player mode.
SoloActionTest
 
StrongBox
Class Strongbox describes a player's Strongbox, a container that can store an infinite amount of resources
StrongBoxController
Class StrongBoxController is the Controller for the strongbox later used in the Graphical User Interface.
StrongBoxTest
 
UI
 
Utils
 
Warehouse
Class Warehouse describes the container where a player can store his resources.
WarehouseTest
